overview: Mockumentary in which we follow Nepomuceno, a mexican migrant who is about to cross into the United States. He’s following the same steps as Rafael Rivera did, a central-american migrant whose body was found floating on the Rio Grande. As Nepomuceno travels on, he will tell us Rafael´s story and the perils of the journey they both endured: hunger, cold, contempt, violence and death.
title: The Death of Rafael Rivera
